isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Power Source (Sleeper) W/PRO SLEEPER

svcproc.title: Power Source (Sleeper) W/PRO SLEEPER
svcproc.para: If an accessory is plugged into the Left Auxiliary Power Source socket, power will flow from battery stud B2 through circuit 14AK, 14AW, fuse F10 - C, circuit 14AY, fuse 583 - A, and circuit 86AH to Left Auxiliary Power Source socket. The ground path is circuit 86 - GD, 11 - GBC, 11 - GBD, and 11 - GBE to ground adapter (454).

If an accessory is plugged into the Right Auxiliary Power Source socket, power will flow from battery stud B2 through circuit 14AK, 14AW, fuse F10 - C, circuit 14AY, fuse 583 - B, and circuit 86AF to Right Auxiliary Power Source socket. The ground path is circuit 86 - GH, 11 - GAG, 11 - GBC, 11 - GBD, and 11 - GBE to ground adapter(454).
